snippet: Lauri Korpikoski’s first career hat trick lifted Edmonton, which chased Lundqvist in the third period and sent the Rangers to their fourth defeat in five games.
lead_paragraph: Lauri Korpikoski’s first career hat trick lifted Edmonton, which chased Lundqvist in the third period and sent the Rangers to their fourth defeat in five games.

headline.print_headline: Henrik Lundqvist Is Pulled in Rangers’ Loss to Oilers
headline.main: Henrik Lundqvist Is Pulled in Rangers’ Loss to Oilers
